snippet.title: Crimen - Mercenary Tales | Launch Trailer | Meta Quest 2 | Carbon Studio
snippet.description:
✅ Play NOW on META QUEST 2 👉 https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4835782143201594/

The time has come, adventurers! From this very moment, you can jump straight into the adventurous world of XVII-century Europe and relive eight truly magnificent tales full of dangers, charismatic figures, and glorious deeds!

Put your sword, flintlock pistol, bow and arrows, ...clay mugs 😅 and other deadly weapons to good use! Travel through numerous breathtaking locations, become a living part of European folk legends, enjoy the sarcastic mercenary humor, and prove to the world that it is you who deserve the name of the greatest adventurer in history!

🗡 Loosen up! An arcade (and quite bloody!) slasher that sets us apart from your typical physics-based VR titles

🗡 Eight incredible funny adventures told by eight expressive characters

🗡 Appealing and colorful comic-like visuals

🗡 Great deal of humor, easter eggs, and pop-culture references

🗡 Numerous historically relevant weapons and locations from 17th-century Europe

🗡Awesome Slav folk musical background from Arkadiusz Reikowski


Follow Crimen - Mercenary tales at: 

👉 https://twitter.com/Carbon_VR
👉 https://www.facebook.com/carbonvr
👉 https://www.tiktok.com/@carbon_studio
👉 https://www.instagram.com/carbon_studio_vr/
👉 https://discord.gg/becomeawizard
